p: In MIMICS, parameters related to uptake rate ( V s and V i) and desorption rate of physically protected soil C ( D a and D b), and proportion of litter input and the two microbial C pools ( f m, f s, and f r) were well constrained (Fig. 2c and Supplementary Fig. 6). None of the modifiers (e.g., V mrc, V mkc, K mrc, and K mkc) for calculating uptake rate and half saturation constant were well constrained.
